questions: I want to program my Cleanbug
Can I set the Cleanbug to clean specific rooms only?
How do I program the Cleanbug's software?
Can I program the Cleanbug manually?
How can I enable the Cleanbug to climb stairs?
questions.answer: To program the Cleanbug, use the accompanying app. You can create cleaning schedules, select specific rooms, and activate the stair-climbing feature.

questions: What can the Cleanbug do?
What is the purpose of the Cleanbug
Can the Cleanbug clean big rooms?
Can the Cleanbug climb stairs?
questions.answer: The Cleanbug is a programmable vacuum and mop robot that can also climb stairs. It can clean rooms of any size and is equipped with a long lasting battery.

questions: How do I update the Cleanbug's software?
Can I update the Cleanbug manually?
How often are software updates released for the Cleanbug?
What should I do if the Cleanbug's update fails?
I want to update my Cleanbug
I want to update the Cleanbug
How can I update the Cleanbug?
questions.answer: To update the Cleanbug's software, use the app to check for updates and follow the instructions. Updates are released periodically. If an update fails, restart the Cleanbug and try again.

questions: How do I reset the Cleanbug to factory settings?
What happens when I reset the Cleanbug?
How do I know if the Cleanbug reset was successful?
I want to reset my Cleanbug to factory settings
Can I reset my Cleanbug to factory settings?
questions.answer: To reset the Cleanbug to factory settings, use the app or press the reset button on the device. Resetting will erase all settings and schedules. The app will confirm if the reset was successful.

questions: What should do if the Cleanbug's wheels stop moving?
I want to replace the Cleanbug's wheels myself?
What should check if the Cleanbug's wheels are stuck?
My Cleanbug's wheels are broken
The wheels of my Cleanbug don't move
questions.answer: If the Cleanbug's wheels stop moving, check for obstructions and clean the wheels. If it doesn't turn on, ensure the battery is charged and properly connected. You can replace the wheels by following the manual. If the wheels are stuck, clean them and check for debris.

questions: How do I fix the Cleanbug if it makes a loud noise?
What should I check if the Cleanbug's noise persists?
My Cleanbug makes noise
My cleanbug makes a loud noise
questions.answer: If the Cleanbug makes a loud noise, check for debris in the brush and wheels. If the brush stops spinning, clean it and check for obstructions. You can replace the brush by following the manual. If the noise persists, contact customer support.

questions: What should I check if the Cleanbug's charging issue persists?
My Cleanbug's isn't charging
The Cleanbug's battery doesn't charge
My Cleanbug's battery doesn't work
The Cleanbug's battery isn't charging
My Cleanbug's battery is broken
The battery of my Cleanbug won't charge
questions.answer: If the Cleanbug's battery doesn't charge, check the charging station and connections. If it stops mid-cleaning, ensure the battery is fully charged. You can replace the battery by following the manual. If the charging issue persists, contact customer support.

questions: How do I fix the Cleanbug if it doesn't connect to Wi-Fi?
What should I check if the Cleanbug's Wi-Fi issue persists?
My Cleanbug cannot connect to Wifi
My Cleanbug has no Wifi
The Wifi of my Cleanbug doesn't work
How do I fix the Cleanbug if it doesn't connect to Wifi?
What should I check if the Cleanbug's Wifi issue persists?
questions.answer: If the Cleanbug doesn't connect to Wi-Fi, check the network settings and ensure the password is correct. If the app doesn't sync, restart the app and the Cleanbug. You can reset the Wi-Fi settings by following the manual. If the Wi-Fi issue persists, contact customer support.

questions: Why isn't my Cleanbug responding?
My Cleanbug doesn't start
My Cleanbug is not starting
Why is my Cleanbug not starting?
questions.answer: If the Cleanbug doesn't start, check the battery and ensure it is fully charged. Make sure the power button is pressed and held for a few seconds. If it still doesn't turn on, try resetting the device or contact customer support.

questions: Why does my Cleanbug stop on the stairs?
My Cleanbug stopped on the stairs
My Cleanbug is stuck on my stairs
Why is my Cleanbug stopping on the stairs?
questions.answer: Ensure the stairs are free of obstacles and the Cleanbug's sensors are clean. If the issue persists, contact support for a sensor calibration guide or spare parts.

questions: Preventive care for Cleanbug.
How can I clean my Cleanbug?
Clean my Cleanbug
How can I care for my Cleanbug
How to prevent issues with my Cleanbug?
How to prevent problems with my Cleanbug?
questions.answer: Clean brushes weekly, update firmware monthly, and avoid wet surfaces unless the ‘Mop Mode’ is activated.

questions: What should I check if the Windowfly's movement is erratic?
My Windowfly moves weird
What should I do if the Windowfly gets stuck?
My Windowfly is stuck
My Windowfly doesn't move
My Windowfly is getting stuck
questions.answer: If the Windowfly's movement appears to be erratic or it doesn't move at all, check the battery and connections, clean the sensors and check for obstructions.

questions: What can the Windowfly do?
What is the purpose of the Windowfly
Can the Windowfly clean high windows?
questions.answer: The Windowfly is a cleaning device that cleans windows autonomously. It is capable of cleaning windows of any size.

questions: The Windowfly's cleaning pads are worn out
How can I replace the Windowfly's cleaning pads?
I want to replace the windowfly's cleaning pads
The cleaning pads of my Windowfly are broken
questions.answer: If the Windowfly's cleaning pads are worn out, replace them by pulling off the old pads from the Velcro strips, taking the new pads out of their packaging, and pressing them firmly onto the Velcro strips to make sure they're securely attached.

questions: How frequently should the Windowfly undergo maintenance?
When is maintenance of the Windowfly recommended?
Is frequent maintenance of the Windowfly recommended?
Should the Windofly undergo maintenace often?
questions.answer: The Windowfly cleans windows autonomously by vacuuming and wiping. It can reach high windows as well. Regular maintenance is recommended every 3 months.

questions: How do I replace the Windowfly's battery?
How long does the Windowfly's battery last?

The Windowfly's battery doesn't charge
My Windowfly's battery doesn't work
The Windowfly's battery isn't charging
My Windowfly's battery is broken
The battery of my Windowfly won't charge
questions.answer: Replace the Windowfly's battery by following the instructions in the manual. It's recommended to use official batteries. The battery lasts for several cleaning cycles. If it drains quickly, check for battery health and replace if necessary.

questions: What should I check if the Windowfly's sensors are not working?
The Windowfly's sensors don't work
My Windowfly's sensors are broken
The sensors of my Windowfly are broken
questions.answer: If the sensors are not working, clean them and ensure they are not obstructed. Additional information on how to maintain the Windowfly's sensors can be found in the manual.

questions: What should I check if the Windowfly's streaking issue persists?
My Windowfly leaves streaks
My Windowfly is leaving streaks on my window
What can I do about the Windowfly streaking issue?
questions.answer: If the Windowfly leaves streaks, clean the pads and ensure they are not worn out. If the cleaning solution runs out quickly, check for leaks. You can replace the cleaning solution tank by following the manual. If the streaking issue persists, contact customer support.

questions: Why isn't my Windowfly responding?
My Windowfly doesn't start
My Windowfly is not starting
My Windowfly won't start
My Windowfly isn't moving
questions.answer: If the Windowfly doesn't start, check the battery and ensure it is fully charged. Make sure the power button is pressed and held for a few seconds. If it still doesn't turn on, try resetting the device or contact customer support.

questions: My Windowfly is stuck on the window. How do I remove it safely from the window without breaking it?
Windowfly removal without breaking it?
My Windowfly is stuck
What can I do about my Windowfly being stuck
questions.answer: Use the emergency release button on the device or the app’s ‘Manual Control’ mode to allow safe removal of your Windowfly. Avoid pulling forcefully to prevent breakage.

questions: How do I prevent streaks with Windowfly?
Can I prevent my Windowfly to leave streaks?
I want to prevent my Windowfly from leaving streaks
I want to prevent my Windowfly to leave streaks
questions.answer: Streaks often come from dirty squeegees. To prevent streaking simply replace the cleaning pad and ensure the water tank uses distilled water.

questions: What should I do if the Gardenbeetle gets wet?
What can I do about my Gardenbeetle getting wet?
Is rain a problem for the Gardenbeetle?
My Gardenbeetle is getting wet
questions.answer: Store the Gardenbeetle in a dry, sheltered place during winter. It can operate in light rain, but it's best to avoid heavy rain. Protect it from extreme weather by storing it properly. If it gets wet, dry it thoroughly before using it again.

questions: What should I do if the Gardenbeetle gets stuck?
My Gardenbeetle is stuck?
My Gardenbeetle is getting stuck
How can I prevent my Gardenbeetle from getting stuck?
questions.answer: Set up the Gardenbeetle by following the instructions in the manual and app. It can handle uneven terrain to some extent. Adjust the cutting height using the app. If it gets stuck, check for obstacles and clear the path.

questions: How do I fix the Gardenbeetle if it makes a strange noise?
What should I check if the Gardenbeetle's noise persists?
My Gardenbeetle makes noise
My Gardenbeetle makes a loud noise
questions.answer: If the Gardenbeetle makes a strange noise, check for debris in the blades and wheels. If the blades stop spinning, clean them and check for obstructions. The motor can be replaced by following the manual. If the noise persists, contact customer support.

questions: Can the Gardenbeetle mow lawn?
How often should the Gardenbeetle mow the lawn?
